page.title: 15BENGEWORTH CHURCH (cont)
page.content: The youth club has about thirty members. There is a group for every age: Mum's and Toddlers, Ladies' Group and the Friendly Circle for the elderly. There are special services and about 24 weddings in a year. There is about one funeral a week. Mr. Banks has five sets of vestments which he wears at each season of the year, but he usually wears a black cassock and a white surplice. On Fridays he goes to the church school or the school walks to church. At least 75% of those living in Bengeworth said they didn't go to church because they were too busy, but they would go to a special service. Children, Mums and Dads go to the Family Service and those who sing in the choir go to choir practice on Fridays.
